The green dinosaur cardigan is super soft. It says it is oversized, but isn’t. I would say it fits a little small. We bought a large, wanting it to be big, but it fits more like a medium.  Fortunately we ordered up, so it still fits. Cute graphic and like the green color.

Not only is this sweater adorable, but it is of wonderful quality. I typically wear an XL as I like my sweaters baggy but the Large fit perfectly.
